Posts.Content: In May 2008 was my first surgery left breast for microcalcifications results bengin, second surgery Oct 2012 left breast results bengin but Stage 0 DCIS.Â  Both surgeries were partial Mastectomy. Now in Feb 2016 I was called back for magnififed views after yearly screening and just received prelim news that mamo showing BIRAD 4 calcifications left breast but not close to the initial 2 surgeries but located further back behind the scar. Super worried really hoping that they are bengin again, has anyone gone through this 3 times in 4 year intervals ?
Posts.Title: 3rd time a little freaky
